name: Grand Core Release [Demo]
description:
Ishtar, a traveling mercenary, has been recently hired to find a specific type of dragon, one that is no longer considered holy or sacred, somewhere in the Crystalline Cave. 

He must either kill it or somehow bring it back alive. He has his own plan to deal with such a corrupted dragon, but even that might not go as planned.

---

Updates will be more likely found on twitter: https://twitter.com/DragonicsDev
